response:
[0:00-0:05]
(Transition: Fade in from black)
Narrator: "Welcome to our module on the ease of scooter ownership."

[0:05-0:10]
(Visual: List of features)
Narrator: "We'll cover the features available for your convenience, their advantages, and how they simplify ownership."

[0:10-0:15]
(Visual: Home Service)
Narrator: "Enjoy home service assistance from your comfort zone, saving more compared to a petrol scooter."

[0:15-0:20]
(Visual: Portable charger)
Narrator: "Experience seamless home charging with a portable charger that plugs into a regular 5A socket."

[0:20-0:25]
(Visual: Hypercharger)
Narrator: "On the go? Our expanding network of hyperchargers has you covered. Just plug in and hypercharge with Mo OS 3."

[0:25-0:30]
(Visual: Charging speed)
Narrator: "It's super fast, giving you up to 50 kilometers range in just 15 minutes. And it's free for all our customers."

[0:30-0:35]
(Visual: App service booking)
Narrator: "Book services easily on our app, with home service options and predictive AI maintenance alerts."

[0:35-0:40]
(Visual: Roadside assistance)
Narrator: "We offer 24/7 roadside assistance in case of a breakdown."

[0:40-0:45]
(Visual: Running cost)
Narrator: "Be immune to rising fuel costs. Save more on fuel prices, servicing, and maintenance costs with Ola S1."

[0:45-0:50]
(Visual: Savings)
Narrator: "With total cost of ownership, you could save up to ₹77,316 in one year and ₹2,51,946 in three years."

[0:50-0:55]
(Transition: Fade out to black)
Narrator: "Thank you for joining us. Enjoy the convenience and savings of your scooter ownership."

[0:55-1:00]
(Visual: Company logo)
Narrator: "Your journey, simplified."
